onboardingFlow.welcomeTitle: You already know what needs to change
onboardingFlow.welcomeSubtitle: Let's help it land. Your entries become songs that reach where words alone can't.

section1.title: Ancient Wisdom
section1.content: 2,500 years ago, seekers traveled to Delphi for clarity and self-understanding. Two timeless ideas guided them: "Know yourself" and "Nothing in excess." This same wisdom now guides aiponge.

section2.title: Your Daily Delphi
section2.content: The oracle never predicted the future — it created space for insight, a mirror rather than an answer. aiponge brings this ancient spirit into your pocket through songs crafted from your words, memories, and emotions.

section3.title: A Space for Reflection
section3.content: This is your space to hear what your life is already telling you — through the music you create from who you are. Welcome to aiponge.

section4.title: The Craft Behind It
section4.content: The songs aren't random. They're shaped by what psychology, philosophy, and healing traditions have learned about how we actually change. Not just understand — but feel differently.

section1.title: your music belongs to you
section1.description:
aiponge is not a traditional music platform.
Here, you are both the artist and the listener.
Each track is created from your entries, emotions, and intentions - not from copying musicians or replacing artistic work.

section2.title: we never commercialize the sacred
section2.description:
breath, awareness, presence, meaning - these universal capacities remain free and untouched.

aiponge only charges for the craftsmanship needed to support you:

section3.title: creativity is a human right
section3.description:
not everyone has access to instruments, training, or studios.
but everyone has emotions.
everyone has a story.
everyone deserves a voice.

ai-generated music in aiponge doesn't replace musicians -
it expands the circle of who can express themselves.

section4.title: no addiction loops, no dark patterns
section4.description:
aiponge does not use attention traps.
we optimize for:

section5.title: your data stays yours
section5.description:
your entries, states, and intentions are deeply personal.
aiponge treats them with the respect they deserve:
section5.bullet4: you control what stays and what gets erased

section7.title: sustainable, not extractive
section7.description:
aiponge charges only for the work required to build and maintain high-quality tools:
ai models, infrastructure, sound engines, updates, and safety.

the philosophical basics - the human part - remain free.

section8.title: human first, technology second
section8.description:
aiponge is designed around one priority:
your inner life.

we support:

commitment.title: our commitment
commitment.text:
aiponge will always stand for:
respect • privacy • transparency • empowerment
creativity • dignity • the freedom to explore your inner world
commitment.tagline: if it doesn't serve your growth, we won't build it.

paywall.headerTitle:
Pricing That Respects
Your Inner Life
paywall.principleText:
we only charge for what costs us money to deliver: ai compute, storage, security, and ongoing development.

everything else — the core philosophy, basic writing, and reflection — stays free.
paywall.thanksForSupport: thank you for supporting aiponge's mission to keep inner work accessible, private, and ad-free
paywall.restoreFailed: Could not restore purchases. Please try again.

accountRequired.title: Create Your Account
accountRequired.message: To subscribe and manage your membership, please create an account first. Your generated content will be saved to your new account.

whereMoneyGoes.title: where your money goes
whereMoneyGoes.subtitle: we want pricing to be as transparent as possible. here is how a typical subscription is used:

whyNotFree.question: why isn't everything free?
whyNotFree.answer: running personalized ai, secure storage, and advanced audio features has a real cost. we only charge to cover that cost and keep aiponge sustainable, private, and ad-free.

payingForSpirituality.question: am i paying for spirituality?
payingForSpirituality.answer: no. breath, awareness, and introspection are universal and remain free. you're only paying for the tools and infrastructure that support your practice.

adsOrData.question: will you ever show ads or sell my data?
adsOrData.answer: no. aiponge is funded by subscriptions, not advertising or data sales. you are the customer, not the product.

canStop.question: can i stop anytime?
canStop.answer: yes. you can cancel or pause your subscription at any time. your basic free tools will remain available.

paywall.legalText: subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
